action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><input_name>command</input_name><instance>9608606f871c0dd0baf50fa90cbb35d2</instance><referenced_table>sys_hub_step_instance</referenced_table><script>{"command":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"tx = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hconnector_tokencreate')
tx.get(fd_data.action_inputs.tx)

var cmd = './hcli token transfer' 

gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hconnector_transfers")
gr.query("transaction", tx.sys_id)

var transfers

while (gr.next) {
    // transfers = transfers + " " + gr.token_id +"@"+gr.sender+"@"+gr.receiver+"@"+gr.token_id+"@"+gr.amount
transfers = transfers + gr.sys_id
}

cmd = cmd +  ' --transfers ' + transfers

k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')

for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) {
  kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hconnector_key')
  kk.get(k[i])
  cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key 
}

return cmd"}}</script><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-14 05:52:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>5a08606f871c0dd0baf50fa90cbb35e0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-14 10:43:06</sys_updated_on></sys_hub_input_scripts><sys_hub_action_input action="delete_multiple" query="model=b735606b871c0dd0baf50fa90cbb35b9^sys_idNOT INdcf9d96f87504dd0baf50fa90cbb354f"/><sys_hub_action_input action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes>element_mapping_provider=com.glide.flow_design.action.data.FlowDesignVariableMapper,uiType=reference,uiTypeLabel=Reference,uiUniqueId=03f27d87-14e9-4029-acb7-c9e2b622b685</attributes><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

gr.query("transaction", tx.sys_id)

while (gr.next) {
     transfers = transfers + gr.token_id +"@"+gr.sender+"@"+gr.receiver+"@"+gr.token_id+"@"+gr.amount
}

cmd = cmd +  ' --transfers ' + transfers

k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')

for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) {
  kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hconnector_key')
  kk.get(k[i])
  cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key 
}

return cmd"}}</script><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-14 09:30:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>29f95d6f87504dd0baf50fa90cbb3531</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-14 10:37:57</sys_updated_on></sys_hub_input_scripts><sys_hub_action_input action="delete_multiple" query="model=e1f95d6f87504dd0baf50fa90cbb351a^sys_idNOT IN6df95d6f87504dd0baf50fa90cbb351d"/><sys_hub_action_input action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes>element_mapping_provider=com.glide.flow_design.action.data.FlowDesignVariableMapper,uiType=reference,uiTypeLabel=Reference,uiUniqueId=03f27d87-14e9-4029-acb7-c9e2b622b685</attributes><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {
